example.text: [*-1] Clad in his trademark black velvet suit , the soft-spoken clarinetist announced that his new album , `` Inner Voices , '' had just been released [*-9] , that his family was in the front row , and that it was his mother 's birthday , so he was going [*-2] to play her favorite tune from the record .
